AzureAd.Domain: Set the AzureAd.Domain property to the domain of your Azure AD tenant
AzureAd.TenantId: Set the AzureAd.TenantId property to the Directory (tenant) ID
AzureAd.ClientId: Set the AzureAd.ClientId property to the Application (client) ID
AzureAd.ClientSecret: Set the value of this to the client secret VALUE
